payload.name: continuous-batching
payload.title: Continuous batching: separate prefill from decode; schedule on token throughput
payload.formal: throughput is tokens/sec, not requests/sec; prefill is parallelizable, decode is sequential.
payload.apm2_mapping: for inference, the scheduler should think in **token budget burn rate**. For the control plane, think in **event throughput** and **receipt throughput**, not “number of sessions.” Track costs per stage (prefill/context compilation, tool actuation, verification) and allocate capacity accordingly.
